title: U.N. Security Council approves 30-day humanitarian truce in Syria
text:
U.N. Security Council approves 30-day humanitarian truce in Syria  26 
The United Nations Security Council approved a resolution demanding a 30-day truce to allow aid deliveries and medical evacuations with the support of Syrian ally Russia after a flurry of last-minute negotiations. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).   
The United Nations Security Council approved a resolution demanding a 30-day truce to allow aid deliveries and medical evacuations with the support of Syrian ally Russia after a flurry of last-minute negotiations. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2CHCO0P
